text.p: Given variables base and num (both > 1), write code that calculates and prints the smallest integer exponent such that base**exponent is strictly greater than num.
text.pre: # when base == 3 and num == 12, it prints 3 # when base == 2 and num == 8, it prints 4 # when base == 4 and num == 2, it prints 1
